item.description:
PLEASE REGISTER FOR THIS EVENT at the MIT Enterprise Forum of Cambridge web-site!

http://www.mitforumcambridge.org/

NFC, Mobile Coupons, QR codes, RFID, Social and Analytics - all on the game board for Retailers. But what technology will dominate the thinking (and dollars) of Retailers?  Hear  from the visionaries of the leading providers of retail technology and the latest research on how retailers will deal with these disruptive technologies.”

Although self checkout is a hot topic, turns out that NFC will only be one of the technologies that retailers will and are flocking to. The challenge is to get shoppers into the store. And once in the store to have stellar store operations to make sure they shop—and buy. Oh, and did we say profitable operations? That still counts most.So what are those technologies? QR Codes, RFID, Mobile, NFC or other wireless methods?

Our stellar panel, who are key innovators and dominators in retail will debate and discuss this very topic. Current market research on retail trends and purchasing will be shared.

PANELISTS

Chris Sellers, CEO of Mobeam

Mike Wehrs, CEO and president, ScanLife Inc.

Paul Steinberg, CTO of Motorola Solutions

Robert Locke, Vice President & General Manager, Store Performance Solutions, Tyco Retail

Moderator: Ann Grackin, CEO of ChainLink Research

group.name: MITEF of Cambridge RFID Circle (Auto-ID & Sensing Solutions)

item.name: What Technology Will Dominate Retail?
